author: Bloomberg News
title: Trump wants to wind down social distancing, ‘would love to’ re-open economy by Easter
description: 'This cure is worse than the problem, he said. 'In my opinion more people are going to die if we allow this to continue'
content:
President Donald Trump said he wants to wind down “social distancing” and re-open the U.S. economy by Easter, which is April 12, after much of the country’s economic activity slowed due to the coronavirus outbreak.
“I would love to have it open by Easter,” T… [+3506 chars]
